Key Match Events: Hungary took the lead in the first half through Roland Sallai's volley
Denzel Dumfries headed home from a Cody Gakpo cross to equalize for the Netherlands
Virgil van Dijk was sent off for two yellow cards in as many minutes
Post-Match Reflections: Virgil van Dijk will miss the Netherlands' next match due to his red card
Denzel Dumfries was praised for his solid defensive performance and his contribution towards the equalizing goal
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hungary are still winless against the Netherlands in five matches
The match was marked by several close calls and near-misses for both teams
